meanings.definition: The action of alluring or enticing someone.
meanings.sent1: The allurement of the shiny toy caught the child's attention.
meanings.sent2: The allurement of the delicious cake made it hard to resist.
meanings.sent3: The allurement of the ice cream truck made the kids run towards it with excitement.
meanings.sent4: The allurement of the mysterious treasure chest beckoned the adventurers to explore further.
meanings.sent5: The allurement of the colorful flowers in the garden was simply irresistible.

meanings.definition: Something that allures or entices; an attractive feature or quality.
meanings.sent1: The sparkling jewelry was an allurement for many window shoppers.
meanings.sent2: The allurement of the exotic beach destination drew many tourists.
meanings.sent3: The allurement of the freshly baked bread wafted through the bakery, tempting customers inside.
meanings.sent4: The allurement of the captivating story kept the audience on the edge of their seats.
meanings.sent5: The allurement of the stunning sunset painted the sky in vibrant hues.
